message:
Title: Silver Linings in Iron Clad Skies

Unguarded, hearts tremble, teetering on the edge,
Kilns of courage, funding more than money,
Real unity gives life, not dread,
Aid in spirit, worth more than honey,
Invoking strength, people are fed,
Never underestimating the power, sunny,
Economies thrive when hope is not bled.
prompt: Russia-Ukraine war: Olena Zelenska warns Ukraine in ‘mortal danger’ without foreign aid – as it happened 3.45pm GMT Summary Ukraine’s first lady, Olena Zelenska, warned that Ukrainians are in “mortal danger” of being left to die if western countries do not continue their financial support. Zelenska made the remarks a day after Republican senators in the US blocked a key aid bill that would have provided more than $60bn worth of support to Ukraine. The
